snippet: The I.R.S. must investigate the American Legislative Exchange Council for illegal lobbying and partisan violations.
abstract: Editorial expresses outrage that the American Legislative Exchange Council retains its tax-exempt status despite the fact that it spends the bulk of its substantial resources lobbying for conservative causes; calls on the IRS to investigate partisan violations at ALEC, along with other financial improprieties.
lead_paragraph: The I.R.S. must investigate the American Legislative Exchange Council for illegal lobbying and partisan violations.
